name: EVENING CHAOS
description:
Gameplay
Experience 2D game-play in a 3D world, dynamic stages, and more. With each character having their own unique attributes, players can pull off amazing combos with the right team combination. Most of all, game play is focus on speed and precision, giving the feeling of a old-school style of beat em ups. Fight till the end against your opponents on a 1 on 1 faceoff until you are the last person standing.

Grooves
There are a number of different fighting styles called "Grooves", which mimic many popular fighting game mechanics, are included in the engine. These dictate both the character's Super Gauge system (energy for super attacks, or desperation attacks), and special techniques (such as dashes, air combos, running,push blocks, parries, and guard cancels, and more)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features Include:
-4 playable characters from the jump
-Vs Mode
-Training Mode
-Fast-pace high powered combat
-Dynamic Backgrounds
-Fluid Controls and Gameplay
-Original Characters with fun, unique abilities, strengths, personalities
-Each character will have a alternate costume to in with their surroundings. For example, if their in a bar, they will be suited up accordingly.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
